name: Compressor
description: This algorithm is a multi-channel compressor where each channel operates independently. It provides convenience for processing multiple bus channels (1-12) without needing to add separate copies of the algorithm. A sidechain input is available, allowing compression of one signal based on the envelope of another. The algorithm functions strictly as an insert effect, meaning its output replaces the input.
use_cases: Compressing multiple module inputs simultaneously (1-12 channels)
Sidechain compression for ducking effects or creative processing
Gain reduction to control dynamic range in a mix
gui_description: The display features a right-to-left signal level graph with superimposed gain reduction. To the right of this graph, there is a bar representing the current gain reduction applied.

specifications.name: Latency
specifications.description: Lookahead time introduces audio delay equal to the lookahead setting.

input_ports.name: Left/mono input
input_ports.description: The left or mono input bus (1-28).

input_ports.name: Right input
input_ports.description: The right input bus for stereo mode, if applicable (0-28). 0 indicates no connection.

input_ports.name: Sidechain input
input_ports.description: The sidechain input bus used to drive compression based on another signal's envelope (0-28).

output_ports.name: Reduction output
output_ports.description: Bus receiving scaled gain reduction values, where 1V equals 6dB of reduction.

output_ports.name: Main output
output_ports.description: The processed audio signal after compression and sidechain mixing.
